snippet: Israel acknowledges that its dangerous world is growing more dangerous. For the country and most of its people, that means not concessions but toughness in pursuit of deterrence.
abstract: Israel and many of its citizens have adopted a far tougher stance on the conflict with Palestine than in previous years, making fewer concessions and pursuing deterrence with greater force; shift has been prompted by increased danger from advanced rocket attacks and the regional shift from authoritarian rulers to Islamist-led governments.
lead_paragraph: Israel acknowledges that its dangerous world is growing more dangerous. For the country and most of its people, that means not concessions but toughness in pursuit of deterrence.

headline.seo: Israel Sticks to Tough Approach in Conflict With Hamas
headline.main: As Battlefield Changes, Israel Takes Tougher Approach
headline.print_headline: Israel, Battlefield Altered, Takes a Tougher Approach
